name: Pressure Temple Ruins
prompt: Top-down tactical map: Pressure Temple Ruins, 30x40 at 140 px per square, clearly marked cover: crates, pillars, rocks, coral, dynamic hazards like collapsing floors, rips, currents, clean export with 10px grid lines and labeled layers, Use aspect and resolution as specified, maintain consistent styling tags, include negative prompts to avoid artifacts.
alt_text: Top-down tactical map of Pressure Temple Ruins with grid and hazards.
